column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Similarly delicious is the bone in dry aged ribeye; a cut to rival any other steak house in Chicago
column2: preferably ordered rare.  What you mind find the most captivating
column4: is dessert.  Their chocolate cake is rich
column5: stunningly delicious and HUGE.  You will definitely want to order this and take it (all) home if necessary
column6: it will keep and give you a full week of pleasure.
